Address.Address1: ASKER OCAGI CADDESI 34367 NO:1 SISLI ISTANBUL

Description.Text: Centrally located in the heart of Istanbul, Divan offers comfortable accommodation in Taksim area with its modern architecture. This luxurious hotel features an on-site Turkish bath and an indoor pool. The spacious rooms of Divan Istanbul have contemporary interiors combined with a touch of traditional Turkish culture. They all include LCD TV, iPod docking station and a minibar. Divan Brasserie serves a rich menu of Turkish and international cuisine. Guests can also enjoy unique tastes of Ottoman and Aegean cuisine in the elegant Divan Restaurant. Delicious cocktails are provided by the Lobby Bar. After a workout at the well-equipped fitness centre, guests can relax with a Turkish bath or visit the sauna. A variety of massages are also offered in the spa centre. The lively Istiklal Street is only a few steps from Divan Istanbul with many shops, art galleries, restaurants and cafes to visit. Free private parking is also available on site. The hotel also offers amenities such as ballroom, dry cleaning, lobby and Reception.

Divan Istanbul is located in the heart of Istanbul, close to Taksim Square. A short walk along broad, tree-lined boulevards is all that separates you from the best culture, nightlife and entertainment that Istanbul has to offer. Major corporate headquarters and shopping centres, as well as the Congress Valley's Lutfi Kirdar Convention and Exhibition Center, Istanbul Congress Center and Cemal Resit Rey Concert Hall are just minutes away by foot. The Istanbul metro is only a brief walk from the hotel.

STANDARD - ROOM - Standard Room offers one Double bed or two Twin bed with air conditioning, alarm clock, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, en-suite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, internet access, iron / ironing board ( on request), laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, radio, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, telephone, valet service and voice-mail. Room Description: All Standard rooms have central A/C. They are decorated in earth tones and with the examples of Ottoman decorations. They have Laptop size electronic safe and charging unit. The rooms include flat screen LCD TV and iPod docking station.
DELUXE - ROOM - Deluxe Room offers one Double or two Twin bed with air conditioning, alarm clock, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, ensuite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, internet access, iron / ironing board ( on request), laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, radio, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, telephone, valet service and voice-mail. Room Description: All Deluxe rooms have central A/C. They are decorated in earth tones and with the examples of Ottoman decorations. They have Laptop size electronic safe and charging unit. The rooms include flat screen LCD TV and iPod docking station. They have also decorated with Molton Brown luxury bathroom products.
JUNIOR - SUITE - Junior Suite Room offers one double bed or two twin bed with air conditioning, alarm clock, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, ensuite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, internet access, iron / ironing board ( on request), laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, radio, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, telephone, valet service and voice-mail. Room Description: All Junior Suites have central A/C. They are decorated in earth tones and with the examples of Ottoman decorations. They have Laptop size electronic safe and charging unit. The rooms include flat screen LCD TV and iPod docking station. They have also decorated with Molton Brown luxury bath products.
